thread.section_title: Hotel Daunou Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A very well located hotel
thread.title_full: A very well located hotel - Review of Hotel Daunou Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Leonardo_Graziadei
title: A very well located hotel
text:
Very Good hotel. Clean. Good value for money. It has AC and elevator. Great location.
Lack of safety bar in the bathtub, which is difficult to get in and out, especially for elderly people. Wi-Fi does not work very well.
Room Tip: From Thursday to Saturday, the street is very busy, making the front rooms very noisy. See more room tips
